metadata.Title: CVE-2022-46280 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A use of uninitialized pointer vulnerability exists in the PQS format pFormat functionality of Open Babel 3.1.1 and master commit 530dbfa3. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openbabel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
